typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		ContactNum as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CustomerInput
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		Country as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		Product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OrdersInput
CustomerInput, OrdersInput join(CustomerInput@CustomerName == OrdersInput@CustomerName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> CustomerOrderInnerJoin
CustomerOrderInnerJoin sort(desc(CustomerInput@Country, true)) ~> SortByCountry
SortByCountry filter(CustomerInput@Country != 'America') ~> FilterByCountry
FilterByCountry sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		ContactNum,
		OrderID,
		CustomerName = OrdersInput@CustomerName,
		Country = OrdersInput@Country,
		OrderDate = OrdersInput@OrderDate,
		Product
	)) ~> CustomerOrderOutputSink
